title: Making emergency supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 2010 for the National Park Service, National Forest Service, and Federal Highway Administration for public land rehabilitation, road projects, and job creation.
content: Public Lands Rehabilitation and Job Creation Act - Makes emergency supplemental appropriations for FY2010 to: (1) the Department of the Interior for National Park Service operations and construction. (2) the Department of Agriculture for the Forest Service for capital improvement and maintenance road projects. And (3) the Department of Transportation (DOT) for the Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) for highway infrastructure investment.
